prathipaththiyak lesa mehi prathichara waranaya kirimak sidu nokere.me prathichara thiraya kiyawana wita mema liyumkarutama bana wadi athi kaments apamana athi bawa oba dakinnata athi.ee nisa asabhya wachana yoda noganna thak durata prathichara makime adahasak nomatha.obe mathaya pala karannata obata sampurna nidahasa methula atha.wenath kenek liyana prathicharayak ( ohu shishta sampanna simawa thula eya sidukara athi thak durata ) sadaha thahanam panawime hakiyawak mata nathi bawa oba therum ganu athayi sithami.
ee welawe mata puduma hithuna, ayi man wage kenek gen skrin test ekak gaththe kiyala.
ema nisa ada dinaya thula oba aagiya thana kapi penena gathi lakshana athi wanu atha.
rawi karunanayaka mahathage paudgalika dhana parithyagayen mema krida upakarana beda harinu labiya.

ohuge nawa wyaparaya wruththimaya thaththwaye sha්rawya drushya upakarana ha upanga aanayanaya, alewiya ha pahasukam sapayime samagamak wana simasahitha dayinamik eewi teknolojis pudgalika samagamayi.nawa samagamehi mehewara se owun handunwanne, shi්ra lankawe sha්rawya drushya wisandum sandaha wadath kamaththak dakwanu labana samagama bawata pathwimayi.

gawayagen minisata wana sewaya athimahathya.kiri laba dima,gowithanata sahaya,pohora labadima,gaman biman karaganima min kotasak pamani.me upakara wenuwen gawaya kisidu wasiyak balaporoththu nowe.ebawin manussayatath wada gunawath sathek bawa hagunath waradak natha.

dumriya salasum adhyaksha wijaya samarasinha hiru pa්rawruththi anshayata sandahan kale dumriya margaye thibena palam aluthwadiya kirima sandaha dumriya gamanagamanaya thawakalikawa nathara kirimata piyawara gath bawayi.
warak indunisiyanu mahacharyawarayek kiwa dushanaya sanwardhanayata lihisi thelak wage kiyala.
aadiwasi dina samarime uthsawayata awashya bulath thoga ape nayaka wannila aththanta ohuge hithawathungen nomile labunu eewa.
ayi moda wanduro, umbaata umbaema kiyala innahitinna than me gas uda oone tharan thibunata, mata thiyenne me punchi kudarama witharayi kiyala umbaata therenne nadda?

amathiwaraya me bawa pawasuwe rajaye prawruththi departhamenthuwe di ada pawathi kabinat thirana danumdime madhya hamuwa amathamini.
ee anuwa, palaweni piyawara lesa dina siyayak athulatha kolonnawata kunu gena eka sampurnayenma nathara karanawa.ethakota kolonnawa nawatha kolambaa kunu enne na.

sewaye nirathawennata athi samana ayithiya, aarthika kriyawaliyata samana ayithiya samana sewayata samana watup, janawargika saha lingikathwa samanathwaya, nithiye samanathwaya, aagamika samanathwaya, samana adhyapana awastha, thorathuru dana ganime samanathwaya waidya prathikara saha pahasukam sandaha samanathwaya samana pudgalika nidahasa yanadiyayi.
hamadamath wage watina adahas tikak dunnata godakma sthuthiyi...
me wage thawath godak de gana me mathrukawedi apata katha karanna puluwan.
menna me wistharaya thamayi pidurangala athitha kathawe ketima keti satahana wenne…
raththaran durlabha lohayak se salakuwath, pruthuwiye polowe sita, minisage danahisa mattama thek aawaranaya kirimata tharam pramanawath raththaran pramanayak pruthuwi kabole atha.

tharagaye thewani dinata (13 da) nawatha damana wita dewani inima krida karana shri lankawa kadulu 2 k dawi lakunu 36 k laba siti athara ee anuwa tharagaye awasan dinaya wana ada (14 da) jayagrahanaya sandaha lakunu 445 k ras kirima ho dinaya ahawara wana thek kadulu atak raka ganime wagakima dimuth karunarathnage nayakathwayen yuth shri lanka “ee” pila hamuwe athi asiru abhiyogayaki.

langata waren koluwo.

ethanadi palamu wasara 8 thula ihala milakuth eelanga wasara hathe di eeta adu milakuth awasana wasara pahedi eetath wada adu milakuth gewannata thiranaya wenawa.kohomath ada wana wita me giwisumgatha kramawedayata anuwa kuda widulibalagara mangin widulibala mandalaya widuli eekaka miladi ganima thula siduwena wishala wanchawak pilibandawa ape shri lanka jathika wyaparaye sabhapathi wimukthi dushantha pasugiyada madhya hamuwak pawathwamin mese prakasha kala.

ada thamayi palaweni parata oya wage gambauru deyak kiyewwe...

jarman soldaduwan thamanta pahasuwena aakarayata yuda agala nirmanathmaka lesa sakas karagaththath wadi kalayak ekama yuda agale inna balaporoththuwak nothibuna brithanya soldaduwan wiwekaya gewannata siya yuda agala gana gena thibune melesayi.
prathipala shunya kalahoth ehi yali chanda wimasima sathi dekak athulatha sidukarana bawath ethek adala palath palana aayathanaye awasan prathipalaya nikuth kirima pramada wana bawada hethema kiya.
wruththiya sarthaka wima wagema aadhyathmika paththen sarthaka wima wagema pawul jiwithaye sarthaka wima matha thamayi mage jiwithaye sathuta randa pawathinne.
mage githa janapriyayi.
emenma hindu bathimathun wishala washayen waranasiwalata paminena kalayedi indiyanu aanduwa da ee pradeshaye rathri kar dhawana tharaga pawathwanne naha.

ohu ese thama wagakim itunokara asamath wimen pasuwa warthamanaye di mema rajaya rate janathawage subasiddhiya wenuwen kriyawata nanwimata uthsaha darana wadapiliwela wiwechanaya kirima dwesha sahagatha kriyawaki.
me sitha purwaye di yam aakarayakin hasirennata kamathi nam e se da, yam thanaka hasirennata kamathi nam e thana da, sapase hasirune ya.
‘rawaya’ kathuwaraya (janaranjana) ohu gana lipi dekakma liya thibuni.
me sambandhayen kawara sudusu kriyamarga ganu labanneda?
mewani abhiyogathmaka adahas pala karana jud rathnam wisin karana lada sinama nirmanaya ada lowa pura chithrapata wicharakayange awadhanayata lak wi thibenawa.

wiwadaya anuwa samasthayak lesa gathkala ajith parakum athdakim bahula palapurudu jyeshtathama lankika blogkaruwa lesa penisiti athara blogkalawa gana ohu mulika washayen ki de anuwa blogkaranaye thawa godak igena ganna thibena aparinatha ayek bawa meyin ithama hondin pahadili wiya.
me gahapu gahili heta anidda eliyata eyi.
ee anuwa oththu balima paseka thaba ohu ema pakshaye anka 55 himi samajikaya lesa pakshayata ekathu wuye ya.

sakakaruwanta nithignyayan saha pawule gnyathin hamuwimata haki wima randawum niyoga nirdesha kirime balaya amathiwarayagen iwath kota polis adhikariwarunta pawarima yam sakakaruwaku dina 90kata wada randawa gani nam, ee gana amathiwarayagen karunu wimasimata mahesthrathwarayata balaya himi wima.
oba yojana karana kra maya gana wadi wisthara danaganna kamathiy.
owun mulathiw – paranthan margaye siya gamata pa්raweshawana sthanaye randemin dina 103k pura owun aragala karamin illa sitinne eyayi.

kese wethath sihisunwa mama kolambaa maha rohale sita masakata pamana pasu niwesata enawita mage niwesa niwasa sanwardhana adhikariya wisin wenath wyaparikayakugen delaksha dahadahak labagena pawarala.

stalinwadi niladharaya, okthobar wiplawaye muladharma pawa demin, thaman sidukala pawadima wasan kirimatath, samajawadaye saba aramunu ha warapa්rasaditha kulayak lesa niladharaya thamange drawyamaya awashyatha aaraksha kirimath athara enta entama gambauru wana pa්rathiwirodhayan wasan kirimatath, nirlajjitha ha bihisunu musawadayange pihita pathiya.
ehenam mama meka kiwwata kamak nathi weyi...
oowa pera kala akusal..
yanna sitha balima apage yuthukamak wanneya.
mewani thaththwayakata path wu wita aarthika awapathayakin ikmanin goda eema sandaha ratakata athi ekama prayogika kramaya prasaranathmaka rajya mula (fiskal) prathipaththiyayi.
aashraya karannath pahasuyi.
ape panthiye hitiya jayasinha kenek mula akuru pahak withara namata thibuna.
ehidi ohu pawasa sitiye "bimathwa melesa gos anathuru sidu karaganna ayagen rupiyal laksha dahayaka pamana dada mudalak" rajayata ayakara gatha yuthu bawayi.
